description:
Efren is of Middle Eastern decent, though he has lived in the U.S. a long time (but not long enough to lose his accent!)
He is a gym guy, spending most of his free time working out, and it shows. I couldn't believe he said he only weighed about 135-40 pounds as I figured that muscle was heavy!
But he is small guy, and his dick is actually nicely hung on his small frame.
He was great shooting photos in the shower, and he really enjoyed jerking off for the camera.
Efren is down for a blow job, so stay tuned next week for some oral entertainment!
title: Efren - Solo
